HOME.description: Experienced Software Developer with a track record of building quality applications. Proficient in Angular.

About.about_para1:
I am an experienced Software Developer with a proven track record in building high-quality applications.
    I am skilled, a fast learner, and proficient in Agile methodologies. I take pride in being among the top women
    in tech who are actively contributing to meaningful innovations and solutions to todayâ€™s challenges.

About.about_para2:
My journey in software development has been fulfilling, marked by significant growth towards my goals.
    I have had the privilege of creating software for a school management system and working with a start-up.
    Currently, my focus is on developing accessible user interfaces.
About.about_para3: Outside of work, I enjoy adventures, reading, and fostering connections with other tech women who share my passion.

Experience.experience_desc1:
Contributed to the development and maintenance of a comprehensive school management
        system, featuring modules for fee payments, course registration, result viewing, transcript management,
        and additional functionalities.
